channel.title: Help with Codes
channel.description:
I am planning on puttin [[b]classified[/b]] into my server.
Therefore, it detects when you get [[b]classified[/b]] in every working stat, and gives you a key.
The key unlocks a door to the [[b]classified[/b]].
I was wondering if anyone could help me make it so it detects when you have [[b]classified[/b]] in every working stat, gives you a key, then you can use it on the [[b]classified[/b]] door to get into the place. Only people with keys can get in.
How would I code this? If you PM me, I'll release the [classfied]'s.

item.title: Help with Codes
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Ok.

PM me.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2007, 08:18:55 PM[/size][hr]He didn’t help.

Anyone else?

Read full topic
